title: Just curious about switching regions
body: What happens when you move to a region where someone already has the same Summoner name as you?

replies.body:
From memory, when you switch regions your summoner name is reverted and you choose a new one on the new server, So if someone currently has your chosen name, you would have to choose a new one.
Your account name/login name will remain the same.
This is correct, I did a dumb once and name changed and then moved region. Expensive mistake.
So you just choose a new one there? I see how that makes sense, thanks guys!
